meta.max_stay: Up to 3 years (for most AEWV roles)
meta.min_funds_requirement: Job offer must meet median wage (approx. 29.66 - 33.56 NZD/hour)

documents.title: Job Offer (AEWV)
documents.description: Full-time offer from an Accredited Employer. Must include 'Job Check' token number.

documents.title: Qualifications & Experience
documents.description: Degree certificates and work experience letters proving you meet the job requirements. IQA assessment may be needed.

documents.title: English Proficiency
documents.description: IELTS/PTE score (if required for the role, usually IELTS 4.0+ for lower skill roles).

documents.title: PCC & Medicals
documents.description: Police Clearance Certificate from India and eMedical results.

steps_flow.title: Employer Accreditation
steps_flow.description: Employer gets accredited and completes a 'Job Check' for the role.

steps_flow.title: Receive Job Token
steps_flow.description: Employer sends you a unique link/token to apply.

steps_flow.title: Apply Online
steps_flow.description: Complete the Accredited Employer Work Visa (AEWV) application.

steps_flow.title: Upload & Pay
steps_flow.description: Upload docs (PCC, Medicals, Qualifications) and pay fees.
